answers.answer: They should have tested u for this earlier this sounds like preeclampsia and they are making me deliver at 37 weeks  because of it I had early onset
You should be fine the doctors have meds to lower ur bp
My bp has been fine for the whole pregnancy until the last two weeks, and he already mentioned inducing if it was still high tomorrow.
O well at least you get to see ur baby early :))

question: So the past two appointments ive had higher bp, i go back tomorrow for a recheck, and im sure it wont be different seeing as ive had a badddd headache for days thats getting worse despite taking Tylenol and getting the broiht spots in my vision, and i was told if its still high i will be induced this weekend, ill be 39 weeks tomorrow and im just nervous. Im already dialted so i hope it makes it easier im just scared.
title: induction....yikes.
